content:
TITLE: Basic Parse Dashboard Configuration in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Basic configuration file example showing how to set up a single Parse Server app in the dashboard using a JSON config file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "apps": [
    {
      "serverURL": "http://localhost:1337/parse",
      "appId": "myAppId",
      "masterKey": "myMasterKey",
      "appName": "MyApp"
    }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Multiple Apps Configuration in JSON
DESCRIPTION: Configuration example for managing multiple Parse Server apps from a single dashboard instance.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "apps": [
    {
      "serverURL": "http://localhost:1337/parse",
      "appId": "myAppId",
      "masterKey": "myMasterKey",
      "appName": "My Parse Server App"
    },
    {
      "serverURL": "http://localhost:1337/parse2",
      "appId": "myAppId",
      "masterKey": "myMasterKey",
      "appName": "My Parse Server App 2"
    }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Parse Dashboard as Express Middleware
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code showing how to integrate Parse Dashboard as Express middleware with basic configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
var express = require('express');
var ParseDashboard = require('parse-dashboard');

var dashboard = new ParseDashboard({
  "apps": [
    {
      "serverURL": "http://localhost:1337/parse",
      "appId": "myAppId",
      "masterKey": "myMasterKey",
      "appName": "MyApp"
    }
  ]
});

var app = express();

// make the Parse Dashboard available at /dashboard
app.use('/dashboard', dashboard);

var httpServer = require('http').createServer(app);
httpServer.listen(4040);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Basic Authentication in Parse Dashboard (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to configure basic authentication for Parse Dashboard by adding usernames and passwords to the parse-dashboard-config.json file. It supports plain text or bcrypt encrypted passwords.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "apps": [{"...": "..."}],
  "users": [
    {
      "user":"user1",
      "pass":"pass"
    },
    {
      "user":"user2",
      "pass":"pass"
    }
  ],
  "useEncryptedPasswords": true | false
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Read-Only Access in Parse Dashboard (JavaScript)
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to configure read-only access for Parse Dashboard by using the readOnlyMasterKey instead of the masterKey in the dashboard configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_16

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
var trustProxy = true;
var dashboard = new ParseDashboard({
  "apps": [
    {
      "serverURL": "http://localhost:1337/parse",
      "appId": "myAppId",
      "masterKey": "YOUR_READ_ONLY_MASTER_KEY",
      "appName": "MyApp"
    }
  ],
  "trustProxy": 1
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Info Panel for Data Browser in Parse Dashboard (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to configure an info panel for the data browser in Parse Dashboard, displaying additional information for selected objects using a Cloud Code function.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_19

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
"apps": [
  {
    "infoPanel": [
      {
        "title": "User Details",
        "classes": ["_User"],
        "cloudCodeFunction": "getUserDetails"
      }
    ]
  }
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Launching Parse Dashboard from Command Line
DESCRIPTION: Launches Parse Dashboard for a single app by providing app ID, master key, server URL, and optional app name. Includes the --dev flag for development environments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
parse-dashboard --dev --appId yourAppId --masterKey yourMasterKey --serverURL "https://example.com/parse" --appName optionalName
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Environment Variables Configuration Example
DESCRIPTION: Example showing environment variable configuration options for Parse Dashboard setup.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
HOST: "0.0.0.0"
PORT: "4040"
MOUNT_PATH: "/"
PARSE_DASHBOARD_TRUST_PROXY: undefined // Or "1" to trust connection info from a proxy's X-Forwarded-* headers
PARSE_DASHBOARD_SERVER_URL: "http://localhost:1337/parse"
PARSE_DASHBOARD_MASTER_KEY: "myMasterKey"
PARSE_DASHBOARD_APP_ID: "myAppId"
PARSE_DASHBOARD_APP_NAME: "MyApp"
PARSE_DASHBOARD_USER_ID: "user1"
PARSE_DASHBOARD_USER_PASSWORD: "pass"
PARSE_DASHBOARD_SSL_KEY: "sslKey"
PARSE_DASHBOARD_SSL_CERT: "sslCert"
PARSE_DASHBOARD_CONFIG: undefined // Only for reference, it must not exist
PARSE_DASHBOARD_COOKIE_SESSION_SECRET: undefined // set the cookie session secret, defaults to a random string. Use this option if you want sessions to work across multiple servers, or across restarts
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: GraphQL Configuration with Icons
DESCRIPTION: Example configuration showing GraphQL server setup with app icons integration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "apps": [
    {
      "serverURL": "http://localhost:1337/parse",
      "appId": "myAppId",
      "masterKey": "myMasterKey",
      "appName": "My Parse Server App",
      "iconName": "MyAppIcon.png"
    }
  ],
  "iconsFolder": "icons"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Parse Dashboard via npm
DESCRIPTION: Installs Parse Dashboard globally using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install -g parse-dashboard
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Column Sort Prevention in Parse Dashboard
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for preventing column sorting in Parse Dashboard by setting preventSort flag for specific columns.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
"apps": [
  {
    "appId": "local_app_id",
    "columnPreference": {
        "_User": [
          {
            "name": "createdAt",
            "visible": true,
            "preventSort": true
          },
          {
            "name": "updatedAt",
            "visible": true,
            "preventSort": false
          }
        ]
      }
    }
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Filter Column Order in Parse Dashboard
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for customizing the order of filter columns by setting filterSortToTop option for specific columns.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
"apps": [
  {
    "columnPreference": {
        "_User": [
          {
            "name": "objectId",
            "filterSortToTop": true
          },
          {
            "name": "email",
            "filterSortToTop": true
          }
        ]
      }
    }
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Persistent Filters in Parse Dashboard
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for creating permanent filters available to all dashboard users using the classPreference setting.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
"apps": [{
  "classPreference": {
    "_Role": {
      "filters": [{
        "name": "Filter Name",
        "filter": [
          {
            "field": "objectId",
            "constraint": "exists"
          }
        ]
      }]
    }
  }
}]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Multi-Factor Authentication in Parse Dashboard (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to enable Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) for a user in Parse Dashboard by adding an MFA secret to the user configuration in the parse-dashboard-config.json file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "apps": [{"...": "..."}],
  "users": [
    {
      "user":"user1",
      "pass":"pass",
      "mfa": "lmvmOIZGMTQklhOIhveqkumss"
    }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring App Access Restrictions in Parse Dashboard (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to restrict app management based on user identity in Parse Dashboard by specifying allowed apps for each user in the parse-dashboard-config.json file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "apps": [{"...": "..."}],
  "users": [
     {
       "user":"user1",
       "pass":"pass1",
       "apps": [{"appId": "myAppId1"}, {"appId": "myAppId2"}]
     },
     {
       "user":"user2",
       "pass":"pass2",
       "apps": [{"appId": "myAppId1"}]
     }  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring User-Specific Read-Only Access in Parse Dashboard (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to configure read-only access for specific users or apps in Parse Dashboard by setting the readOnly flag in the user or app configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_17

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "apps": [
    {
      "appId": "myAppId1",
      "masterKey": "myMasterKey1",
      "readOnlyMasterKey": "myReadOnlyMasterKey1",
      "serverURL": "myURL1",
      "port": 4040,
      "production": true
    },
    {
      "appId": "myAppId2",
      "masterKey": "myMasterKey2",
      "readOnlyMasterKey": "myReadOnlyMasterKey2",
      "serverURL": "myURL2",
      "port": 4041,
      "production": true
    }
  ],
  "users": [
    {
      "user":"user1",
      "pass":"pass1",
      "readOnly": true,
      "apps": [{"appId": "myAppId1"}, {"appId": "myAppId2"}]
    },
    {
      "user":"user2",
      "pass":"pass2",
      "apps": [{"appId": "myAppId1"}]
    }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Localized Push Notifications in Parse Dashboard (JSON)
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to configure localized push notifications in Parse Dashboard by specifying supported locales in the app configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_18

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "apps": [
    {
      "serverURL": "http://localhost:1337/parse",
      "appId": "myAppId",
      "masterKey": "myMasterKey",
      "appName": "My Parse Server App",
      "iconName": "MyAppIcon.png",
      "supportedPushLocales": ["en", "ru", "fr"]
    }
  ],
  "iconsFolder": "icons"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring App Background Colors in Parse Dashboard
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for setting custom background colors for Parse Dashboard apps using CSS color values. Supports both hex and RGB color formats.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "apps": [
    {
      "serverURL": "http://localhost:1337/parse",
      "appId": "myAppId",
      "masterKey": "myMasterKey",
      "appName": "My Parse Server App",
      "primaryBackgroundColor": "#FFA500",
      "secondaryBackgroundColor": "#FF4500"
    },
    {
      "serverURL": "http://localhost:1337/parse",
      "appId": "myAppId",
      "masterKey": "myMasterKey",
      "appName": "My Parse Server App [2]",
      "primaryBackgroundColor": "rgb(255, 0, 0)",
      "secondaryBackgroundColor": "rgb(204, 0, 0)"
    }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Cloud Function Scripts in Parse Dashboard
DESCRIPTION: Configuration for executing Cloud Functions through the dashboard UI with custom fields and validation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
"apps": [
  {
    "scripts": [
      {
        "title": "Delete Account",
        "classes": ["_User"],
        "cloudCodeFunction": "deleteAccount",
        "showConfirmationDialog": true,
        "confirmationDialogStyle": "critical"
      }
    ]
  }
]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing Cloud Function Handler in Parse Server
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript implementation of a Cloud Function that handles requests from the Parse Dashboard scripts configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Parse.Cloud.define('deleteAccount', async (req) => {
  req.params.object.set('deleted', true);
  await req.params.object.save(null, {useMasterKey: true});
}, {
  requireMaster: true
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Segments in Parse Dashboard Info Panel
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to configure segments in a Parse Dashboard info panel with a basic text item. Each panel can contain multiple segments to display different groups of information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_20

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "panel": {
    "segments": [
      {
        "title": "Purchases",
        "items": [
          {
            "type": "text",
            "text": "This user has a high churn risk!"
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Text Item in Parse Dashboard Info Panel
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to create a simple text item in a Parse Dashboard info panel. Text items are used to display plain text information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_21

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "text",
  "text": "This user has a high churn risk!"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Basic Key-Value Item in Parse Dashboard
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates a basic key-value pair in a Parse Dashboard info panel. Key-value items display information in a labeled format without linking to external resources.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_22

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "keyValue",
  "key": "Lifetime purchase value",
  "value": "$10k"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Key-Value Item with External URL in Parse Dashboard
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to create a key-value item that links to an external URL in a Parse Dashboard info panel. This allows users to navigate to external resources for additional information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_23

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "keyValue",
  "key": "Last purchase ID",
  "value": "123",
  "url": "https://example.com/purchaseDetails?purchaseId=123"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Key-Value Item with Relative URL in Parse Dashboard
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates a key-value item with a relative URL for navigation within the Parse Dashboard. The isRelativeUrl flag ensures the link points to another page within the dashboard.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_24

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "keyValue",
  "key": "Purchase",
  "value": "123",
  "url": "browser/Purchase",
  "isRelativeUrl": true
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Key-Value Item with URL-encoded Query Parameters in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to navigate to a specific object using a relative URL with URL-encoded query parameters in Parse Dashboard. This technique allows for filtering to specific objects in the browser view.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_25

LANGUAGE: js
CODE:
```
const objectId = 'abc123';
const className = 'Purchase';
const query = [{ field: 'objectId', constraint: 'eq', compareTo: objectId }];
const url = `browser/Purchase?filters=${JSON.stringify(query)}`;
const item = {
  type: 'keyValue',
  key: 'Purchase',
  value: objectId,
  url,
  isRelativeUrl: true
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Table Item in Parse Dashboard Info Panel
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to create a table item in a Parse Dashboard info panel. Tables are used to display structured data with defined columns and rows.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_26

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "table",
  "columns": [
    {
      "name": "Name",
      "type": "string"
    },
    {
      "name": "Age",
      "type": "number"
    }
  ],
  "rows": [
    {
      "Name": "Alice",
      "Age": 30
    },
    {
      "Name": "Bob",
      "Age": 40
    }
  ]
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating an Image Item in Parse Dashboard Info Panel
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to embed an image in a Parse Dashboard info panel. Image items are used to display visual content from a specified URL.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_27

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "image",
  "url": "https://example.com/images?purchaseId=012345"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Video Item in Parse Dashboard Info Panel
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to embed a video in a Parse Dashboard info panel. Video items allow for displaying video content directly within the dashboard.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_28

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "video",
  "url": "https://example.com/video.mp4"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating an Audio Item in Parse Dashboard Info Panel
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to embed audio content in a Parse Dashboard info panel. Audio items provide playback capabilities for audio files within the dashboard.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_29

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "audio",
  "url": "https://example.com/audio.mp3"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Button Item in Parse Dashboard Info Panel
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to create an interactive button in a Parse Dashboard info panel. Buttons can trigger HTTP requests to perform actions when clicked, with configurable parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_30

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "button",
  "text": "Click me!",
  "action": {
    "url": "https://api.example.com/click",
    "method": "POST",
    "headers": {
      "Content-Type": "application/json"
    },
    "body": {
      "key": "value"
    }
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Panel Item in Parse Dashboard Info Panel
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to create a sub-panel in a Parse Dashboard info panel. Panel items load data on-demand when expanded, using Cloud Code functions to fetch relevant information for the selected object.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_31

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "type": "panel",
  "title": "Purchase History",
  "cloudCodeFunction": "getUserPurchaseHistory"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for Parse Dashboard Development
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the necessary dependencies for developing Parse Dashboard. It should be run after cloning the repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Parse Dashboard in Development Mode
DESCRIPTION: This command starts the Parse Dashboard in development mode. It automatically rebuilds files when changes are made, allowing for immediate testing at localhost:4040.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dashboard
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Parse Interface Generator (PIG) for Component Development
DESCRIPTION: This command starts the Parse Interface Generator, which provides a component library and documentation for React components. It can be accessed at localhost:4041.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run pig
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Automated Tests for Parse Dashboard
DESCRIPTION: This command runs the automated test suite for Parse Dashboard. It's important to ensure all tests pass before submitting a pull request.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating Boilerplate Code for New React Components
DESCRIPTION: This command generates boilerplate code for a new React component. Replace 'yourComponentName' with the desired name of your new component.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run generate yourComponentName
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Markdown Changelog Entry for Parse Dashboard
DESCRIPTION: A markdown-formatted changelog tracking Parse Dashboard updates, including features, improvements, and bug fixes across multiple versions. Each entry includes contributor attribution and links to full changelogs.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/changelogs/CHANGELOG_release.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
### 1.3.0
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/compare/1.2.0...1.3.0)

* Node 10 Support
* Fix: Remove column dialog default values
* Fix: Handle case of null in array
* Fix: JSON file upload
* Fix: Set initial audience null
* Fix: Ensure we traverse the payloadJSON properly
* Improvements: Push Audiences
* Improvements: Docker Build
* Feature: `preventSchemaEdits` option
* Feature: Redirect to first app browser for single app
* Feature: Add classname to browser title
* Feature: Support for Clone Object
* Feature: Add tvOS support to push targeting
* Feature: Display dashboard username when using username login
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Semantic Version Release Header in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Version heading showing the semantic version number 5.4.0 with compare link to previous version
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/changelogs/CHANGELOG_release.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# [5.4.0](https://github.com/ParsePlatform/parse-dashboard/compare/5.3.0...5.4.0) (2024-05-16)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Semantic Version Release Header in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Version heading showing the semantic version number 5.3.0 with compare link to previous version
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/changelogs/CHANGELOG_release.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# [5.3.0](https://github.com/ParsePlatform/parse-dashboard/compare/5.2.0...5.3.0) (2023-11-16)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Semantic Version Release Header in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Version heading showing the semantic version number 5.2.0 with compare link to previous version
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/changelogs/CHANGELOG_release.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# [5.2.0](https://github.com/ParsePlatform/parse-dashboard/compare/5.1.0...5.2.0) (2023-09-15)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Parse Dashboard Configuration Option Example
DESCRIPTION: Example of the columnPreference configuration option that prevents columns from being used for sorting
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/changelogs/CHANGELOG_release.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "columnPreference": {
    "preventSort": true
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Git Commit References
DESCRIPTION: Git commit hashes and issue references for various changes and fixes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parse-community/parse-dashboard/blob/alpha/changelogs/CHANGELOG_release.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
